name: Find Yeti
description:
You find yourself on an expedition to find the fabled monster of the arctic. He resides deep within this maze-like valley! Do you have what it takes… to find… YETI? 

Controls:

W,A,S,D- Move

Spacebar- Jump

Mouce- Look around

F- Take Photo

Esc- Quit Game

To play open the archive, and extract the files. After that run the .exe file, and the game will run. You would need a high-eng graphics cars, as the game isn't optimized.

(This is my fist ever game)
